20110118001021.000|20110118001022.000|CC1|  AS THE TOWEL USED TO DRY THEM.
20110118001022.000|20110118001022.000|CC1|  SO WHY USE THE SAME HAND TOWEL
20110118001022.000|20110118001024.000|CC1|          OVER AND OVER         
20110118001024.000|20110118001024.000|CC1|       INSTEAD OF A CLEAN,      
20110118001024.000|20110118001029.000|CC1|      FRESH ONE EVERY TIME?     
20110118001029.000|20110118001031.000|CC1|   KLEENEXÂ® BRAND HAND TOWELS.  
20110118001031.000|20110118001031.000|CC1|       A CLEAN, FRESH TOWEL     
20110118001031.000|20110118001034.000|CC1|           EVERY TIME.          
20110118001034.000|20110118001035.000|CC1|When you realize that depression
20110118001035.000|20110118001037.000|CC1|  has left you nowhere to go.   
20110118001037.000|20110118001037.000|CC1| When you've lost interest in   
20110118001037.000|20110118001039.000|CC1|          everything.           
20110118001039.000|20110118001039.000|CC1| When you've had one too many   
20110118001039.000|20110118001043.000|CC1|days feeling sad or anxious...  
20110118001043.000|20110118001045.000|CC1|   aches and pains, fatigue.    
20110118001045.000|20110118001045.000|CC1|When it becomes hard to ignore  
20110118001045.000|20110118001047.000|CC1|      that you need help.       
20110118001047.000|20110118001050.000|CC1|That's the day you do something.
20110118001050.000|20110118001051.000|CC1|       Depression hurts.        
20110118001051.000|20110118001051.000|CC1|  Cymbalta can help with many   
20110118001051.000|20110118001054.000|CC1|    symptoms of depression.     
20110118001054.000|20110118001054.000|CC1| Tell your doctor right away if 
20110118001054.000|20110118001056.000|CC1|    your depression worsens,    
20110118001056.000|20110118001056.000|CC1|  you have unusual changes in   
20110118001056.000|20110118001059.000|CC1|behavior or thoughts of suicide.
20110118001059.000|20110118001059.000|CC1|  Antidepressants can increase  
20110118001059.000|20110118001059.000|CC1| these in children, teens, and  
20110118001059.000|20110118001103.000|CC1|         young adults.          
20110118001103.000|20110118001103.000|CC1|  Cymbalta is not approved for  
20110118001103.000|20110118001105.000|CC1|       children under 18.       
20110118001105.000|20110118001105.000|CC1|     People taking MAOIs or     
20110118001105.000|20110118001108.000|CC1|          thioridazine          
20110118001108.000|20110118001108.000|CC1| or with uncontrolled glaucoma  
20110118001108.000|20110118001110.000|CC1|   should not take Cymbalta.    
20110118001110.000|20110118001110.000|CC1|   Taking it with NSAID pain    
20110118001110.000|20110118001112.000|CC1|           relievers,           
20110118001112.000|20110118001112.000|CC1| aspirin, or blood thinners may 
20110118001112.000|20110118001114.000|CC1|    increase bleeding risk.     
20110118001114.000|20110118001114.000|CC1|  Severe liver problems, some   
20110118001114.000|20110118001117.000|CC1|     fatal, were reported.      
20110118001117.000|20110118001117.000|CC1|Signs include abdominal pain and
20110118001117.000|20110118001120.000|CC1| yellowing of the skin or eyes. 
20110118001120.000|20110118001120.000|CC1|Talk with your doctor about your
20110118001120.000|20110118001122.000|CC1|           medicines,           
20110118001122.000|20110118001122.000|CC1|including those for migraine, or
20110118001122.000|20110118001125.000|CC1|    if you have high fever,     
20110118001125.000|20110118001126.000|CC1|  confusion and stiff muscles,  
20110118001126.000|20110118001126.000|CC1|     to address a possible      
20110118001126.000|20110118001128.000|CC1|  life-threatening condition.   
20110118001128.000|20110118001128.000|CC1| Tell your doctor about alcohol 
20110118001128.000|20110118001131.000|CC1|      use, liver disease,       
20110118001131.000|20110118001131.000|CC1| and before you reduce or stop  
20110118001131.000|20110118001133.000|CC1|        taking Cymbalta.        
20110118001133.000|20110118001133.000|CC1|Dizziness or fainting may occur 
20110118001133.000|20110118001135.000|CC1|         upon standing.         
20110118001135.000|20110118001135.000|CC1|Side effects include nausea, dry
20110118001135.000|20110118001139.000|CC1|    mouth, and constipation.
